function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Elderly population at higher risk of infection and mortality due to degeneration of immunity.","Impact":"Higher mortality rate and increased burden on healthcare systems if not prioritized for testing and protection.","Mitigation":"Prioritize testing and protection for the elderly to lower infection rates and mortality.","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Elderly population","Owner":"Healthcare authorities and government"},{"Description":"Children at risk of severe symptoms due to Kawasaki syndrome and artery diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of severe symptoms and complications for children with specific conditions.","Mitigation":"Provide specific protection and care for children with Kawasaki syndrome and artery diseases.","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Children with specific conditions","Owner":"Healthcare authorities and medical professionals"},{"Description":"Higher infection rate in younger population due to insufficient social distancing and mask protection.","Impact":"Increased transmission of the virus among younger population due to lack of protective measures.","Mitigation":"Promote social distancing and mask-wearing among younger population to reduce infection rate.","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Younger population","Owner":"Healthcare authorities and government"}]}
